alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Lorain; Medina; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:18PM EDT until August 12 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Ashland County in north central Ohio... Northern Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 218 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Polk, or 12 miles northeast of Ashland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Medina, Wadsworth, Orrville, Rittman, Doylestown, Lodi, Creston, West Salem, Chippewa Lake, Savannah, Polk, Sullivan, Seville, Smithville, Clinton, Westfield Center, Marshallville, Spencer, Gloria Glens Park and Bailey Lakes. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio.
